Name: Walter Langton
Notes: Doncaster's longest serving playerAppearance stats don't include seasons 1887–1901 nor 1903–04 which are likely to put his total appearances over 400

Name: Tom Keetley
Notes: Record all time goalscorer.Most goals in one game – 6 v Ashington in 1929

Name: Paddy McConnell
Notes: The first current Doncaster player to represent his country at international level, Paddy played for Ireland

Name: Syd Bycroft
Notes: Including Wartime League matches, he played 501 games for Doncaster giving him the overall all-time record number of appearances.Joint manager of Doncaster January–June 1958
